page.title: 20 CUDHAM - POST OFFICE STORES
page.content:
The Village shop and Post Office is in he centre of Cudham. The building is 200-300 years old and has been the Post Office for more than 40 years. G.P.O. supplies come from the main branch at Tonbridge.The shop also sells newspapers,sweets,tobacco,groceries, bread,stationery and fancy goods. Customers include about 508 villagers and some passing trade. Sales have dropped since a supermarket was opened a few years ago.
*************************************** * CREDITS * * The information on this area was * * collected for the Domesday Project * * as part of a Co-operative Study by * * the staff and chidren of Downe and * * Cudham Primary Schools. * * * ***************************************
